# 6.0 Docs

## Serialization

- [Default serialization format for TimeSpan](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/6.0/timespan-serialization-format.md): Learn about the .NET 6 servicing release breaking change where the default serialization format for TimeSpan in source generators has changed.
- [IAsyncEnumerable serialization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/6.0/iasyncenumerable-serialization.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where the System.Text.Json supports IAsyncEnumerable serialization.
- [JSON source-generation API refactoring](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/6.0/json-source-gen-api-refactor.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where the APIs called by JSON source generator output were refactored.
- [JsonNumberHandlingAttribute on collection properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/6.0/jsonnumberhandlingattribute-behavior.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where JsonNumberHandlingAttribute can now only be applied to properties that are collections of numbers.
- [New JsonSerializer source generator overloads](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/6.0/jsonserializer-source-generator-overloads.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where new JsonSerializer source generator overloads were added that might affect source compatibility.
